name: Snowboard League
description:
Introducing Snowboard League, the ultimate snowboarding racing game
that challenges you to become the Snowboard League Champion.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER

with unique snowboard designs, hats, facial features, jackets, and choose from a variety of colors for each clothing item.
Earn currency by winning races, and use it to unlock more customization options.

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS

Up to 8 people can race at the same time, so make sure to invite all of your friends!

IMPROVE YOUR BEST TIMES AND MEET LOTS OF INTERESTING CHARACTERS

Race your previous best time in the form of a ghost in the Single player Time Trial Mode and race against lots of interesting characters in Story Mode!

ENDLESS HOURS OF SNOWBOARDING FUN

With free updates adding more maps, customizations, and game modes, Snowboard League will grow over time!
